info.title: Toilet Map API
info.description: Programmatic access to Toilet Map loos and administrative areas.

cookieAuth.name: access_token
cookieAuth.description: Session cookie issued via `/admin/login`. Contains a JWT tied to the user session and falls back to `id_token` when `access_token` is absent.

anyOf.description: A day with opening hours: [open, close] in HH:mm format
A closed day represented as an empty array

OpeningTimes.description: Opening times for each day of the week. Array has 7 elements: Monday (0) through Sunday (6). Each element is either ["HH:mm", "HH:mm"] for open days, or [] for closed days. If all opening times are unknown, the entire field is null.

AdminArea.description: Administrative subdivision associated with a loo.

contributor.description: Contributor identifier. Null unless the caller provides an Auth0 admin token.

diff.description: Field-level changes introduced by the report.

LooMutation.description: Attributes accepted when creating or updating a loo.

openingTimes.description: Opening times for each day of the week. Array has 7 elements: Monday (0) through Sunday (6). Each element is either ["HH:mm", "HH:mm"] for open days, or [] for closed days. If all opening times are unknown, the entire field is null.

location.description: Optional location update. Null clears an existing location.

area.description: Administrative areas linked to the loo.

openingTimes.description: Opening hours for each day of the week, or null if completely unknown.

reports.description: Recent reports are populated on specific endpoints.

contributorsCount.description: Number of contributors recorded for the loo.

distance.description: Distance from the requested point in meters.

contributor.description: Contributor identifier. Null unless the caller provides an Auth0 admin token.

diff.description: Field-level changes introduced by the report.

recentWindowDays.description: Number of days considered when computing recent updates.

recent.description: Records updated within the recentWindowDays timeframe.

areas.description: Top areas by record count for the current filters.

data.description: Summary report entries. Pass hydrate=true to receive full Report objects. Contributor fields are null unless the caller includes an Auth0 admin token.

get.description: Returns a compressed list of all active loos. Optimized for initial map loading. Cached for 1 hour.

200.description: Compressed list of all active loos.

parameters.name: geohash
parameters.description: Geohash prefix to match.

parameters.name: active
parameters.description: Filter loos by activity status. Use `any` to disable the filter.

parameters.name: compressed
parameters.description: Return compressed data optimized for map rendering. If true, returns CompressedLoo objects.

200.description: Loos matching the supplied geohash prefix.

parameters.name: lat
parameters.description: Latitude in decimal degrees.

parameters.name: lng
parameters.description: Longitude in decimal degrees.

parameters.name: radius
parameters.description: Search radius in meters (default 1000).

200.description: Loos ordered by distance from the supplied coordinates.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Keyword search across id, name, geohash, and notes.

parameters.name: areaName
parameters.description: Matches administrative area name (case-insensitive).

parameters.name: areaType
parameters.description: Matches administrative area type (case-insensitive).

parameters.name: active
parameters.description: Active status. Omit to include all values, or use `unknown` for records where active status is not available.

parameters.name: accessible
parameters.description: Whether the toilet is accessible. Omit to include all values, or use `unknown` for records where accessibility information is not available.

parameters.name: allGender
parameters.description: Whether the toilet is all-gender. Omit to include all values, or use `unknown` for records where this information is not available.

parameters.name: radar
parameters.description: Whether a RADAR key is required. Omit to include all values, or use `unknown` for records where RADAR key information is not available.

parameters.name: babyChange
parameters.description: Whether baby change facilities are available. Omit to include all values, or use `unknown` for records where this information is not available.

parameters.name: noPayment
parameters.description: Whether the toilet is free (no payment required). Omit to include all values, or use `unknown` for records where payment information is not available.

parameters.name: verified
parameters.description: Verification status. Use `any` to include all values.

parameters.name: hasLocation
parameters.description: Filter by whether the record has a known location. Use `any` to include all values.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort order for results.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum results per page (1â€“200, default 50).

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number (1-indexed, default 1).
